headline: EQT Closes Midstream Joint Venture with Blackstone Credit & Insurance
summary: EQT Corporation (NYSE: EQT) (together with its subsidiaries, "EQT") announced today that it has closed on the formation and funding of its previously announced midstream joint venture ("JV") with an affiliate of Blackstone Credit & Insurance ("BXCI"; Blackstone (NYSE: BX)). EQT received $3.5 billion of cash consideration, net of certain transaction fees and expenses, from BXCI in exchange for a non-controlling common equity interest in the JV. EQT used the proceeds from this transaction to pay d

headline: Very Good News For BDCs, But Is 11%-Yielding BIZD A Buy?
summary: Analyzing the rebound of the BDC sector and whether the high-yielding BIZD is a good investment opportunity for investors.
